title: MOOC-Based Collaborative Competency Enhancement Course: Development of Mathematical Problem-Solving Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Non-real-time collaborative learning in a smartphone-centric limited technological environment, emphasizing mathematical problem-solving competencies for professionals in corporate specialized fields (medical/legal/technical)

learning_goals: Learners can explain the process of collaboratively solving complex mathematical problems with peers at over 80% accuracy.
Learners can improve mathematical models by incorporating peer feedback at least 3 times using LMS-based collaboration tools.
Learners can complete group assignments within 48 hours by combining MOOC content with real-time chat.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
